column3: The Soft Skills: Developing Interpersonal Abilities course offers a unique opportunity for participants to enhance their soft skills which are deemed crucial for both career success and personal growth In todays world where the importance of interpersonal communication time management problem-solving and leadership skills is ever-growing the ability to effectively apply soft skills becomes paramount to success leadership skills is ever-growing the ability
